name: distributed-game-system
description: Distributed Two Person Game System with Microservices

scripts.start:services: concurrently "npm run start:user-service" "npm run start:room-service" "npm run start:game-service"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/user-service && npm install && cd ../room-service && npm install && cd ../game-service && npm install && cd ../../clients/cli-client && npm install && cd ../web-client && npm install && cd ../mobile-client && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:clients
scripts.build:services: cd services/user-service && npm run build && cd ../room-service && npm run build && cd ../game-service && npm run build
scripts.build:clients: cd clients/cli-client && npm run build && cd ../web-client && npm run build && cd ../mobile-client && npm run build

author: Aminu Iliyasu
